Value.label: Wake up 10 minutes when batteries are inserted
Value.Help: Stay awake for 10 minutes after batteries are inserted 0 -> No 1 -> Yes

Value.label: On time
Value.Help: How long should the device associated to multi sensor keep state On before sending it Off command (if the value is bigger than 255, the value would be rounded to next integer in minutes)

Value.label: Enable Motion Sensor
Value.Help: Enable Motion Sensor 0 -> Disabled 1 -> Enabled

Value.label: Command Options
Value.Help: Which commands to send when PIR motion sensor triggered 1 (default) -> Basic Set 2 -> Binary Sensor Report

Value.label: Reset #101-103
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1 Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report 5 -> Temperature 6 -> Humidity 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 2 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2 Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report 5 -> Temperature 6 -> Humidity 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 3 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 3 Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report 5 -> Temperature 6 -> Humidity 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Reset #111-113
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 111-113. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1. 1 seconds - 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2. 1 seconds - 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3. 1 seconds - 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Enable/Disable ALL ON/OFF
Value.Help: Activate/Deactive ALL ON/OFF

Item.label: ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF active
ALL ON active / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active / ALL OFF active

Value.label: Auto off relay after specified time
Value.Help: Auto off relay after specified time, with the possibility of manual override - immediate Off after button push. Default value: 0 Manual override disabled

Value.label: Relay 1: OFF-delay time (10ms)
Value.Help: Automatic turning off relay 1 after set time, in 10ms increments (default: 200ms)

Value.label: Relay 2: OFF-delay time (10ms)
Value.Help: Automatic turning off relay 2 after set time, in 10ms increments (default: 200ms)

Value.label: Separation of association sending (key 1)
Value.Help: Activate/Deactivate association sending for group 1 - Also see param #16

Item.label: Map status to all devices in group 1 (default)
Map OFF status to all devices in group 1, Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to prev.value
Map OFF status to all devices in group 1, Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to 100%

Value.label: Control key #2 behaviour
Value.Help: Key no.2 is not represented by any physical device except of devices on association list. This functionality prevents of lack of reaction on pressing key no.2 through polling devices from association list one by one and checking their actual statuses.

Value.label: Inputs behaviour
Value.Help: In case of bi-stable switches, define their behaviour (toggle or follow)

Value.label: Inputs Button/Switch configuration
Value.Help: Binary inputs type configuration

Value.label: Dimmer/Roller shutter control
Value.Help: Enable/Disable opoeration of dimmer or roller shutter devices associated to group 1. Available only when using mono-stable inputs (buttons) - Hold button 1 or double-tap for operation

Value.label: Saving state before power faillure
Value.Help: Saving state before power faillure

Item.label: State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore
DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

Value.label: Relay 1: Response to Water Flood Alarm

Item.label: DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

Value.label: Relay 1: Response to Smoke, CO, CO2 Alarm

Item.label: DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)
DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

Value.label: ALARM FLASHING alarm time
Value.Help: Amount of time (ms) the device keeps on flashing after receipt of Alarm Frame

Item.label: DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

Value.label: Relay: Response to Water Flood Alarm

Item.label: DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

Value.label: Relay: Response to Smoke, CO, CO2 Alarm

Item.label: DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)
DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)

Value.label: Active flashing alarm time
Value.Help: Amount of time (ms) the device keeps on flashing after receipt of Alarm Frame

Value.label: Enable/Disable ALL ON/OFF
Value.Help: Activate/Deactive ALL ON/OFF

Item.label: ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF active
ALL ON active / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active / ALL OFF active

Value.label: Auto off relay after specified time
Value.Help: Auto off relay after specified time, with the possibility of manual override - immediate Off after button push. Default value: 0 Manual override disabled

Value.label: Relay 1: OFF-delay time (10ms)
Value.Help: Automatic turning off relay 1 after set time, in 10ms increments (default: 200ms)

Value.label: Relay 2: OFF-delay time (10ms)
Value.Help: Automatic turning off relay 2 after set time, in 10ms increments (default: 200ms)

Value.label: Separation of association sending (key 1)
Value.Help: Activate/Deactivate association sending for group 1 - Also see param #16

Item.label: Map status to all devices in group 1 (default)
Map OFF status to all devices in group 1, Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to prev.value
Map OFF status to all devices in group 1, Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to 100%

Value.label: Control key #2 behaviour
Value.Help: Key no.2 is not represented by any physical device except of devices on association list. This functionality prevents of lack of reaction on pressing key no.2 through polling devices from association list one by one and checking their actual statuses.

Value.label: Inputs behaviour
Value.Help: In case of bi-stable switches, define their behaviour (toggle or follow)

Value.label: Inputs Button/Switch configuration
Value.Help: Binary inputs type configuration

Value.label: Dimmer/Roller shutter control
Value.Help: Enable/Disable opoeration of dimmer or roller shutter devices associated to group 1. Available only when using mono-stable inputs (buttons) - Hold button 1 or double-tap for operation

Value.label: Saving state before power faillure
Value.Help: Saving state before power faillure

Item.label: State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore

ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)
